entity.name: Lukasz Gornicki
entity.description: I'm an individual contributor with my own business entity that allows me to create invoices and do some consulting. I'm maintaining AsyncAPI spec, generator and few other AsyncAPI repositories. Also act as Executive Director pushing for setup of the board. Not sure what URL you need in another section. My personal work is under https://www.brainfart.dev/ but all my work is into AsyncAPI, thus I put all resources pointing to AsyncAPI. If you support me, I will only work on AsyncAPI-related stuff.

projects.name: specification
projects.description: Main project where AsyncAPI specification is maintained. The real repo URL is https://github.com/asyncapi/spec, I provided another one cause after over 1 hour of fighting with validation of funding.yml and wellKnown mechanism to check if I'm a real maintainer - I simply gave up. You can easily validate if I'm a maintainer by checking CODEOWNERS file: https://github.com/asyncapi/spec/blob/master/CODEOWNERS
